title: LF Coaching / Gold 5 adc main
body: Hey guys just looking for anyone in the plat + that wants to give me a bit of advice on my in game and generally hel;p me become a better player overall. Please add me in game if you are interested.

replies.body: Add me on League of Legends. I play with about 3 other guys that are pretty good and would be more then happy to help young rookies.
